title: (Sold) Thanksgiving Weekend Grab Bag Special Lot
author: Archive

posts.post_title: (Sold) Thanksgiving Weekend Grab Bag Special Lot
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian C.
Here's a "can't go wrong" Thanksgiving weekend special: four 1911 Helmar Stamps; 14 1947 Remars out of 25, including Stengel (9 different); 9 1950 Helmars out of 27, including George Kelly and two of Billy Herman; and a 1940 Play Ball of Paul "Big Poison" Waner. On average, a mid-grade group, with some better and some worse. $88 takes the lot.

[IMG]http://i79.photobucket.com/albums/j154/bcampf/helmars-1.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i79.photobucket.com/albums/j154/bcampf/remars_waner.jpg[/IMG]

Jason was first in line, so he gets 'em. Thanks to those who inquired. Jason, please check your email for payment info.
